content.text:
# List of awards and honors received by George W. Bush

George W. Bush, the 43rd president of the United States, has received numerous honors in recognition of his career in politics. These include:
National honors
{| class="wikitable" style="width:65%;"

! style="width:55%;"| Decoration
|-
|  || 6 January 2009 || Department of Defense Medal for Distinguished Public Service
|}

|-
|  || 1 February 2002 || Order of the Cross of Terra Mariana (1st Class)
|-
|  || 23 November 2002 || Order of the Star of Romania
|-
|  || 18 October 2003 || Order of Sikatuna (Grand Collar)
|-
|  || 7 May 2005 || Order of the Three Stars (Commander Grand Cross with Chain)
|-
|  || 10 May 2005 || St. George's Order of Victory
|-
|  || 10 June 2007 || National Flag Decoration
|-
|  || 13 January 2008 || Order of Zayed (Collar)
|-
|  || 14 January 2008 || Order of King Abdulaziz (Collar)
|-
|  || 16 February 2008 || National Order of Benin (Grand Cross)
|-
|  || 21 February 2008 || Order of the Pioneers of Liberia (Grand Cordon)
|-
|  || 15 December 2008 || Amir Amanullah Khan Award
|-
|
|26 September 2015
